descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: The Pistons and the Hornets struggle to put together quality possessions with careless passing and poor shot selection in the second quarter.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Pistons, Hornets struggle to find a groove) 2021/03/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: Pistons, Hornets struggle to find a groove
